channel.title: Soldier Front
channel.description:
Hi, who here plays Soldier Front. I do, i'm 1st Lieutenant and I use PSG-1 and AK-74. For those who dont know what i'm on about: http://www.ijji.com Go there for top class games made by pro's. Soldier Front is a free FPS game go here: http://youtube.com/watch?v=Vo4EtdfGAFU For a video preview. Direct link to Soldier Front: http://www.sfront.ijji.com
**Note**
If your computer has less than 512 MB of RAM then I suggest you don't play Soldier Front otherwise you will lag.
Thanks.

item.title: Soldier Front
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I have played soldier front. The physics are pretty much non existent. It’s sucks and its grainy and cluttered. And very un realistic and un interactive.

Warrock is like counter strike without the ability to mod it without getting banned.

Read full topic

item.description:
@arr0w wrote:

Ew! Soldier Front graphics are good they made it look like this in that video. Warrock sucks.

www.warrock.net
